get.description:
Retieve a single fee schedule.

Requires the feeschedule_reader role to access.

put.description:
Updates a fee schedule.

Requires the feeschedule_writer role to access

delete.description:
Delete a fee schedule.

Requires the feeschedule_remover role to access.

get.description:
Fetch the facility for a fee schedule.

Requires the feeschedule_reader role to access.

put.description:
Update a feeschedules facility details.

Requires the feeschedule_writer role to access.

get.description:
Get the events for a fee schedule.

Requires the feeschedule_reader role to access.

post.description:
Add a new event onto the fee payment schedule.

Requires the feepayment_writer role to access.

get.description:
Get a single event on a fee schedule.

Requires the feeschedule_reader role to access.

put.description:
Updates an event on a feeschedule.

Requires the feeschedule_writer role to access.

delete.description:
Remove an event from a fee schedule.

Requires the feeschedule_writer role to access.

get.description:
Get all fees for a schedule.

Requires the feeschedule_reader role to access.

post.description:
Adds a fee onto the schedule.

Requires the feeschedule_writer role to access.

get.description: Throws 422 when lender does not have an API key set.
